name: Sundarbans Mangrove
description: Explore the world's largest mangrove forest and spot the Royal Bengal Tiger.

name: Cox's Bazar Beach Retreat
description: Relax on the longest natural sea beach in the world with luxurious amenities.

name: Srimangal Tea Garden Tour
description: Take a guided tour through the lush tea gardens of Srimangal and enjoy traditional tea tasting.

name: Sylhet Waterfall Expedition
description: Discover the scenic waterfalls of Sylhet and experience the natural beauty of Ratargul Swamp Forest.

name: St. Martin's Island Coral Cruise
description: Enjoy a scenic cruise to the coral island of St. Martin's and experience its crystal-clear waters.

name: Bandarban Hill Tracts
description: Embark on an exhilarating journey through the scenic hills of Bandarban, exploring tribal culture .
